code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  maxSum ( vector < int >&  nums1 ,  vector < int >&  nums2 )  {   constexpr  int  kMod  =  1'000'000'007 ;           long  ans  =  0 ;     long  sum1  =  0 ;     long  sum2  =  0 ;   int  i  =  0 ;    int  j  =  0 ;    while  ( i  <  nums1 . size ()  &&  j  <  nums2 . size ())   if  ( nums1 [ i ]  <  nums2 [ j ])  {   sum1  +=  nums1 [ i ++ ];   }  else  if  ( nums1 [ i ]  >  nums2 [ j ])  {   sum2  +=  nums2 [ j ++ ];   }  else  {    ans  +=  max ( sum1 ,  sum2 )  +  nums1 [ i ];   sum1  =  0 ;   sum2  =  0 ;   ++ i ;   ++ j ;   }   while  ( i  <  nums1 . size ())   sum1  +=  nums1 [ i ++ ];   while  ( j  <  nums2 . size ())   sum2  +=  nums2 [ j ++ ];   return  ( ans  +  max ( sum1 ,  sum2 ))  %  kMod ;   }  };
